title: How to Get the Puppet to Kill You in Five Nights at Freddy's 2

steps.headline: Go to the Prize Corner camera.
steps.description: Don't leave it unless you hear another animatronic in your office and need to put on the Freddy Fazbear head.

steps.headline: The music box is the key.
steps.description: Don't wind it up at all. Not even a little bit. It will make it take longer.

steps.headline: Go to another camera.
steps.description: When you go back, turn your flashlight on. If you are lucky, you will see him coming out of the box. It's creepier in person than in a video.

steps.headline: Wait until he is all the way out.
steps.description: In the full version, you may see the endoskeleton come out of his box. This most likely won't happen in the demo. He can't hurt you, but The Puppet can.

steps.headline: When he is coming for you, you will hear a "Pop Goes The Weasel" begin to play.
steps.description: He is after you now. You almost certainly will not finish the game at this point. He is going to kill you.

steps.headline: If jumpscares freak you out, you may want to turn off your volume.
steps.description: His scream is loud, like all the other jumpscare screams in FNAF.

steps.headline: When his long song is over, you will have a few seconds before he jumpscares you.

text: Go to the Prize Corner camera. Don't leave it unless you hear another animatronic in your office and need to put on the Freddy Fazbear head. The music box is the key. Don't wind it up at all. Not even a little bit. It will make it take longer. Wait until it runs out. Then don't wind it up. Go to another camera. When you go back, turn your flashlight on. If you are lucky, you will see him coming out of the box. It's creepier in person than in a video. Wait until he is all the way out. In the full version, you may see the endoskeleton come out of his box. This most likely won't happen in the demo. He can't hurt you, but The Puppet can. When he is coming for you, you will hear a "Pop Goes The Weasel" begin to play. He is after you now. You almost certainly will not finish the game at this point. He is going to kill you. If jumpscares freak you out, you may want to turn off your volume. His scream is loud, like all the other jumpscare screams in FNAF. When his long song is over, you will have a few seconds before he jumpscares you.  And there you go! You experienced The Puppet's jumpscare!
